LanguageData.MoveSpeed.label: 移動速度
LanguageData.MentalBreakThreshold.label: 精神的弱さ
LanguageData.MentalBreakThreshold.description: 精神的弱さを表し この値を下回れば精神崩壊する危険性があります
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.label: 精神感応性
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.description: 精神波の影響を受けやすい倍率を表します
LanguageData.GlobalLearningFactor.label: 身につけやすさ
LanguageData.GlobalLearningFactor.description: 全てのスキルにおいての身につけやすさを表します
LanguageData.EatingSpeed.label: 食事の早さ
LanguageData.ComfyTemperatureMin.label: 快適と感じる最低気温
LanguageData.ComfyTemperatureMin.description: この温度を下回ると、低体温、凍傷、そして死に至ります
LanguageData.ComfyTemperatureMax.label: 快適と感じる最高気温
LanguageData.ComfyTemperatureMax.description: この気温を上回ると、熱中症、そして死に至ります
LanguageData.ImmunityGainSpeed.label: 免疫能力
LanguageData.ImmunityGainSpeed.description: 病気に対して免疫を得るにかかる時間。もしこの時間が遅ければ、この人物は病原菌に対して免疫を得る前に侵されて死ぬでしょう
LanguageData.CarryingCapacity.label: carrying capacity
LanguageData.CarryingCapacity.description: The amount of stuff this creature can carry in its hands, mouth, or other manipulators.
LanguageData.MeatAmount.label: meat amount
LanguageData.MeatAmount.description: The amount of meat you will get from butchering this creature.
LanguageData.LeatherAmount.label: leather amount
LanguageData.LeatherAmount.description: The amount of leather you will get from butchering this creature.
LanguageData.MinimumHandlingSkill.label: minimum handling skill
LanguageData.MinimumHandlingSkill.description: This creature cannot be tamed, trained, or commanded by anyone with less than this skill in animals.
